News.Title: AB Infrabuild Wins ₹10.75 Cr Highway Contract in MP
News.Summary: AB Infrabuild Limited secured a new EPC contract worth ₹10.75 crores from MP Road Development Corporation for constructing additional lanes on NH-30 in Madhya Pradesh with 9-month completion timeline.

News.Title: A B Infrabuild Reports Decline in Q2 Financial Performance
News.Summary: A B Infrabuild reported Q2 net profit of 21 million rupees compared to 36 million rupees in the same quarter last year, representing a significant decline. The company's Q2 revenue also decreased to 373 million rupees from 472 million rupees year-over-year, indicating weakened operational performance.
